parser module

CCDA Parser

By Garron Anderson

class parser.Parser(filename)[source]

Bases: object

Parse CCDA files.

DOB()[source]

Retrieve the patient’s date of birth.

address()[source]

Retrieve the patient’s address. Returns a 3 line string suitable for printing.

gender()[source]

Retrieve the patient’s gender.

get_component(name=None, index=None)[source]

Get one of the components. Handles a variable number of components and different titles.

Uses lookup_code to access database.

get_data(obj, field, codesystem=None)[source]

Get the data from an object with a field.

Does not yet support auto-detecting codesystem - so codesystem must be provided as an argument.

lookup_code(code, codesystem)[source]

Lookup a code in the SQLite database by codesystem.

To perform a reverse lookup, prefix ‘codesystem’ with ‘reverse_’.

name()[source]

Retrieve the patient’s name.

race_ethnicity()[source]

Retrieve the patient’s race and ethnicity (as a tuple).

exception parser.ParserException[source]

Bases: Exception

A class for when the parser raises an exception.
